channel.title: [614] add objects, npcs
channel.description:
------------------------(Open Your Source)------------------------
First Objects
Go in: 614 source\src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\net ----Open Frames.java---- Search for: [code] public void sendOtherLoginPackets() {[/code] add under it: [code] /* *added OBJECTS ID X Y H */ RSObject object = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3489, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel RSObject object2 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3488, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel RSObject object3 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3487, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel addMapObject(object); //add object addMapObject(object2); //add object2 addMapObject(object3); //add object3 /* *End Objects */[/code] //Barrel = the name of the object 362 = Object ID 3087 = Coord X 3489 = Coord Y 0 = Height //coord x is the first coord if You do `coords\\ this are 3 objects for more objects do: [code] RSObject object3 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3486, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel[/code] And: [code] addMapObject(object4); //add object4[/code]
end of objects
Add Npcs
go in : 614 source\Data Open: Npcs Search for: [code][END][/code] put this 1 up [code]/* *added npcs */ npc = 8133 2942 4378 0[/code] like this: [code]/* *added nps */ npc = 8133 2942 4378 0 [END][/code] 8133 = Npc ID 2942 = Coord X 4378 = Coord Y 0 = Height Hope It help Loled2,

item.title: [614] add objects, npcs
item.dc:creator: @loled2 loled2
item.description:
@loled2 wrote:

------------------------(Open Your Source)------------------------

First Objects
Go in:

614 source\src\dragonkk\rs2rsps\net
----Open Frames.java----

Search for:

	public void sendOtherLoginPackets() {

add under it:

/* *added OBJECTS ID X Y H */ RSObject object = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3489, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel RSObject object2 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3488, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel RSObject object3 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3487, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel addMapObject(object); //add object addMapObject(object2); //add object2 addMapObject(object3); //add object3 /* *End Objects */
//Barrel = the name of the object
362 = Object ID
3087 = Coord X
3489 = Coord Y
0 = Height
//coord x is the first coord if You do `coords\

this are 3 objects for more objects do:

		RSObject object3 = new RSObject(362, 3087, 3486, 0 , 10, -1); //Barrel

And:

		addMapObject(object4); //add object4
end of objects
Add Npcs
go in :

614 source\Data
Open:

Npcs

Search for:

[END]

put this 1 up

/* *added npcs */ npc = 8133 2942 4378 0

like this:

/* *added nps */ npc = 8133 2942 4378 0 [END]
8133 = Npc ID

2942 = Coord X

4378 = Coord Y

0 = Height

Hope It help

Loled2,

Read full topic
